name: photoprism
description: PhotoPrism is a self-hosted AI-powered photo organizer that automatically tags and indexes images using machine learning. It supports RAW formats, browsing, search, and has a polished UI for photographers.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Automatically classify and tag photos using machine learning for objects, scenes, and faces

features.title: Raw Format Support
features.description: Process and display RAW files from professional cameras with embedded preview generation

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Create albums and collections to organize photos beyond folder structures

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find photos using natural language queries combining tags, dates, locations, and metadata

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your library from iOS and Android devices with native mobile applications
